story.title: Double - Episode 3
story.storyDescription: When Kate meets a stranger who looks EXACTLY like her boyfriend, she discovers that there’s more to this world—and her relationship—than meets the eye.
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: EJ Hendricks is a writer with a passion for new media. She resides in New York City with her cat.

messages.text: Are you kidding me right now??
He threw a rock at my window
He almost broke into my house
Okay, but why would my dad lie about his own son being dead?
My dad said Trevor killed himself
So much for that stupid Twintuition
Wait, I think I’ve heard of this
I read about it in Mysteries of the Afterlife
Kate, I love you, and I know you like reading about the occult…
It only exists to make people feel better about the fact that someone they loved died
The book said that sometimes the spirit of the deceased attaches itself onto a living family member
Like, someone that they had a strong connection to in life
Before he died, I hadn’t seen Trev in almost 4 years
But he was still your twin
He’s not a ghost! He’s a poltergeist
Look, let’s not argue about this right now
I think that we should stay focused on your safety
I’m almost there now…DON’T do anything crazy
Why do you keep assuming I’ll do crazy things??
I don’t appreciate the way you’re talking to me right now.
I thought you said I was your spooky girl 👻
I shouldn’t discount the things you believe in
I just think we need to acknowledge the sources of danger that are part of THIS world
All this time, I’ve been dying to get in touch with my mom, or any spirit really…
And now you’ve got one you can’t get rid of!
Ohmigosh! That’s it. I know what we need to do
Kate. I’m not sure one of your occult theories will apply right now.
And I think that it’ll help me fix it.
Then I need you to listen to me
Run into the woods, but don’t look for me
But I need you to buy me some time
Yes. Kind of like a bear trap, but for spirits
I’m drawing one in the dirt now
If I can pull it off, we’ll be able to detach his spirit from yours
Well, a pentagram is a powerful symbol and spirits are terrified of it
So if we can lure him to it, he’ll go cowering back into the astral plane
I don’t want to say it
Kate. What does the book say will happen if you can’t detach Trevor’s spirit from mine?
It says that he could kill you and take your place
